itemInfo.itemDesc:
A sphere that contains ancient cool water that is used to make the Flare of the Ancients.

- Usage: Craft Flare of the Ancients

- Crafting Method: Processing (L) - Simple Alchemy

- Crafting Materials: 
Dim Origin of Clear Water x1
Dim Origin of Crimson Flame x1
Dim Origin of Earth x1
Ancient Spirit Dust x4

- How to Obtain: Processing (L) - Simple Alchemy with the following materials 
Essence of Nature x2
Powder of Darkness x10

item.name: Powder of Darkness
item.desc: A natural resource that can be used to alter other resources through Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: There's a small chance of acquiring it from Rocks.

item.name: Essence of Nature
item.desc: An essence extracted from Fruit of Nature, a fruit obtained at a low rate through Farming. It's used as an ingredient in Alchemy.\n\n- How to Obtain: > Craft via an Alchemy Tool in your residence when at least Alchemy Apprentice 1.

item.name: Flare of the Ancients
item.desc:
A flare that produces an explosion of brilliant light.

- Stuns nearby enemies for a period of time when used in the Altar of Blood.
